name: Line_Hydro_to_Site
description: 5 km medium voltage line from hydropower bus to AC 415 bus.

name: Line_Grid_to_Site
description: High voltage line connecting the grid bus to the AC 415 bus.

name: Line_Battery_to_Site
description: 2 km medium voltage line connecting battery inverter bus to AC 415 bus.

name: Line_Solar_to_Site
description: 1.5 km medium voltage line connecting solar PV bus to AC 415 bus.
